text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Did you know there are a large variety of nearly 2000 cherry blossom trees planted at Mifuneyama Rakuen in Saga?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: It's a sight worth seeing at night too, very different from midday when it's all lit up in the dark.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: — All those cherry blossoms, each unfolding their full beauty through their flowers…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Hehehe, it sounds a little like our "Victory Club"♪
